body:
1. Delete everything from inside /tmp/<user>/spack-stage
2. Execute "spack stage <package with resources>"
3. Confirm presence of package and resource directories in staging directory.
4. Execute "spack clean --stage"
5. Verify that package staging directory is removed, but resource directories remain.
6. Execute "spack clean --all"
7. Verify that resource directories still remain in staging directory.

Using spack v0.15.4 on a RHEL7 machine.
title: "spack clean --all" is not removing staged resources
